amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that Congress should enact a long term reauthorization of the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program and appropriate $750,000,000 for the program in fiscal year 2006.

vote.text: Amendment SA 188 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 188 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S2909-2910, S2911, S2929; text: CR S2910) To express the sense of the Senate that Congress should enact a long term reauthorization of the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program and appropriate $750,000,000 for the program in fiscal year 2006.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 188 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 188 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
